data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Al Khor, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Khor, Qatar

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Al Khor, Qatar.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 121 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Al Khor access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Al Khor.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 31,600 people living in Al Khor, Qatar. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Al Khor, Qatar.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, help the 261 believers in Al Khor to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
